text:
Mićo Mićić (6 September 1956 – 23 December 2020) was a Bosnian Serb politician. He was mayor of Bijeljina from 2004 until his death in 2020. He was a member of the Serb Democratic Party. Mićić was born in Bijeljina.
Mićić died on 23 December 2020 at a hospital in Bijeljina from COVID-19 at the age of 64.
